multiple_choice.question: What were the names of the daughters?
Where did Adie go to fetch water?
When did Adhoch go to look for her sister?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: The step sisters loved each other very much
Adie was hard working, neat, kind and well behaved
Adhoch studied and played when Adie was busy working

meanings.jealous: feeling or showing an envious resentment of someone

meanings.reply: say something in response to something
meanings.present: a thing given to someone as a gift
